type: Legendary Creature – Human Soldier Lord Noble
rules_text:
[i]Pair Up[/i] – Whenever Lucina, Avenger of Time, attacks a player, if exactly one other creature is attacking that player, Lucina can't be blocked this turn.
[i]Crit[/i] – Whenever Lucina deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
[i]Promote[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, if you drew three or more cards this turn, transform Lucina.
